entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
